name: Drawing Universe
description:
I'm uploading some of the games I made for iOS in High School to itch.io.

Drawing Universe is a refined sequel to my game Drawing Galaxy. It consists of 100 new levels (and 100 more from Drawing Galaxy) where you draw planets which have their own gravity to perform jumping tricks to avoid comets and get to the goal. There are 10 new worlds, each with their own unique theme.
